subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: During the 138th Saratoga Race Course meeting, horsemen and horseplayers will be scouting the new 2-year-olds, looking for the jewel that might be fit for a Triple Crown next spring.
snippet: During the 138th Saratoga Race Course meeting, horsemen and horseplayers will be scouting the new 2-year-olds, looking for the jewel that might be fit for a Triple Crown next spring.
